Detailed Description

This structure contains the system clock setup parameters

Field Documentation

IMG_BOOL SYS_tag_sConfig::bSetupSystemClock

Set to true to set up the system clock

CLOCK_eSource SYS_tag_sConfig::eMetaClockSource

The source clock used to generate the Meta clock -- Possible sources: CLOCK_SOURCE_XTAL1, CLOCK_SOURCE_PLL

IMG_UINT8 SYS_tag_sConfig::ui8SysClockDivider

System and UCC clock divider, between 0 and 3 inclusive

CLOCK_eSource SYS_tag_sConfig::ePLLSource

The source clock used by the SYS PLL, if PLL is chosen as source for Meta Clock (above) -- Possible sources: CLOCK_SOURCE_XTAL1, CLOCK_SOURCE_XTAL2

IMG_UINT16 SYS_tag_sConfig::ui16MetaClockDeletion

Number of cycles deleted from each 1024 Meta Clock cycle period

IMG_UINT16 SYS_tag_sConfig::ui16SysClockDeletion

Number of cycles deleted from each 1024 System Clock cycle period

IMG_UINT8 SYS_tag_sConfig::ui8DDRClkDivider

DDR Clock Divider

IMG_UINT32 SYS_tag_sConfig::ui32TargetFreq_fp

The desired META Clock frequency, in MHz, Q12.20 format

IMG_UINT32 SYS_tag_sConfig::ui32ActualFreq_fp

If bSetupSystemClock is true, then the API will set the following to the META Clock frequency after system clock configuration, in MHz, Q12.20 format

If bSetupSystemClock is false, then the API will set the following to the META Clock frequency as set up by the IMG file (or current register configuration), in MHZ, Q12.20 format

IMG_UINT32 SYS_tag_sConfig::ui32XTAL2Freq_fp

The frequency of XTAL2, in MHz, Q12.20 format

IMG_BOOL SYS_tag_sConfig::bUseXTAL2AsOsc

Set to true to allow XTAL2 to be fed by an oscillator (rather than an xtal)

struct { ... } SYS_tag_sConfig::sUCCConfig

The UCC configuration

IMG_BOOL SYS_tag_sConfig::bEnableWIFI

Set to true to enable the WIFI

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • sys_config.h
